DOC.brief_summary: Effectiveness technique dynamic massage therapy hamstring patient nonspecific low back pain .
DOC.brief_title: Massage Therapy Hamstrings Patients With Nonspecific Low Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: The main objective study test effectiveness technique dynamic massage therapy hamstring patient nonspecific low back pain . Secondary objective ass whether technique dynamic massage therapy increase extensibility hamstring , ass whether treatment hamstring decrease low back pain determine whether application technique decrease disability associate nonspecific low back pain .
DOC.criteria: 1865 year old . Low back pain three month evolution . Practice sport regularly ( least three time week ) . Fractures , Tumors , congenital anomaly , rheumatic disease , infectious inflammatory process . Pathology Nerve root Presence neurological deficit neuromuscular disease . Surgery Physiotherapy treatment low back pain last 30 day . Drugs previous 24h
